comments:
In MyEclipse platform, There is an error when I open a jsp file.The infomation
is "An error has occurred when creating this editor".

I have the same problem, wheh I have installed MyEclipse 4.1 GA over a Eclipse 3.1.0, and try to open a jsp (perspective MyEclipse J2EE Development), it appears the last message of error: "Unable to create part:"

Any solutions or workaround???

Thanks in advanced, 
best regards
Juanjo

It seems that this bug occurs with different editor plugins. I have found other bug descriptions and pages on the internet where this is happening in all kinds of different situations.

I my case, I try to open a perl file and I get:

This is very frustrating because there seems to be nothing that would enable me to somehow avoid this error or figure out what is actually going wrong here.
